HELLO,
I'm available for work. 
This is Ashish Patil ,recent graduate from Florida International University in Masters of Computer Science.
I believe that my experience and skills would be great fit for the position you are looking for.
Please find my resume and cover letter below.

CV
Ashish Patil
 
1440, SW, 104 Path, #107
Miami, FL - 33174

CV




Professional info​
Passionate, Results-driven and well organized Software Engineer/Developer, with year of professional and academic experience in Java programming, Testing, Data Modelling, Web Designing, User Interface, Database design, SQL queries, PLSQL and Stored Procedures.
Work experience
Project Developer
​2015 - 2016
 
Worked on HTML and CSS, for ambitious projects of IU at School of Computer and Information Science. AI also got involved in development team where I worked on java in Eclipse. java, JDBC and ODBC. Expertise in Core Java with strong understanding and working knowledge of Object Oriented Concepts. Also worked on tools  of database like PgAdmin and WinRDBI.
 
Developed complete documentation of result survey of undergrad student in summer and fall 2015 about their progress by merging data from different data stores. Transformed data from source data format to destination data format i.e. Survey to Report of Project. 
 
Ambassador/ Grader.
2015-2016
 
Designed and developed a plan for undergrad student for their academic courses, to get good grades and to graduate. Implemented this by being Ambassador for most of CS courses like Java, Web Engineering, DBMS, Web Application, Software Eng., Algorithm and Theory of Computation.
 
Software Developer
​2014
 
Project: "Implementation of chessboard using Artificial Intelligence with Best Moves"
Paper Published in INTERNATIONAL Journal of Computer Science & Information Technology (IJCSIT)
The project entails working of Artificial Intelligence. Initially a chessboard with sensors is used for the playing. These physical movements are displayed on the screen at same time. Tracking of keys will help in the detection of the keys. Mainly this project has combined two major Concepts that is Artificial Intelligence & Virtual Reality.

ASI (Acadamic Success Initiative) 
In this project I have developed and maintained user Interface and database of It, for the students who all were part of this project.All information of student like personal and academic handled by me (So, I really understand the importance of security of private data. I know how critical and important it is.). Then I also got involved in development team where I worked on java in Eclipse. java, JDBC Java Database Connectivity and ODBC   Open Database Connectivity .I also have developed number of survey in html and css in website.

Online Patient Management Sysytem (Software Engineering)
Project development followed SDLC agile methodology,In which I have used Java 8 Programming Language for developing application logic in Eclipse and MySQL for database, COCOMO Constructive Cost Model II model for cost estimation I learnt and used Bootstrap for front end, and also worked on Papyrus plugin in Eclipse for creation of all UML (Unified modelling language) diagrams like use case, object, class, sequence, deployment etc.I generated test cases and tested in Junit and Selenium.

Implementation of Artificial Intelligence for Best Moves using Chessboard
Artificial intelligence (AI) is the intelligence of machines and the branch of computer science that aims to create it. This is an application of Artificial Intelligence. Initially a chessboard with sensors are used for the playing. This is then displayed in the screen. This chess playing consists of two major parts. First, is the detecting of the illegal moves. This avoids the player from making wrong moves. Second part gives you the best moves that can be achieved while playing. The best moves can be provided for any person who is new for the chess playing. The minimax algorithm and the alpha- beta pruning is used for the best moves implementation. The Artificial Intelligence is used in the best moves implementation. This chess playing provides the above two important features.
Project paper published in International Journal of Computer Science and Information technology.(Click on Image of project to see published paper)
